La Fitora

Located in Port Olímpic, La Fitora offers a perfect setting to enjoy Mediterranean cuisine with views over the sea and the port of Barcelona. Divided into two rooms, two outdoor terraces and a covered terrace, the restaurant offers a menu prepared with fresh quality products and good value for money.

La Fitora offers a recipes of traditional seafood cuisine, that used to be prepared on the high seas with products that had just been fishes, such as the Patron’s fish ‘suquet’, the ‘rossejat’ rice or the delicious rice with lobster, in addition to paella, grilled fish and seafood and fish fresh from the market.

Location: Olympic port

Dining room capacities: 108, 130, 120 pax

Price Level: average

Style: Mediterranean cuisine

Vegetarian Options/Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
